getCurrentValue(uint256).details: Allows the user to get the latest value for the requestId specified

params._requestId: is the requestId to look up the value for

getCurrentValue(uint256).return: bool true if it is able to retreive a value, the value, and the value's timestamp

getDataBefore(uint256,uint256).details: Allows the user to get the first value for the requestId after the specified timestamp

params._requestId: is the requestId to look up the value for
params._timestamp: after which to search for first verified value

getDataBefore(uint256,uint256).return: bool true if it is able to retreive a value, the value, and the value's timestamp

valueFor(bytes32).details: Allows the user to get the latest value for the requestId specified using the  ADO specification for the standard inteface for price oracles

params._bytesId: is the ADO standarized bytes32 price/key value pair identifier

valueFor(bytes32).return: the timestamp, outcome or value/ and the status code (for retreived, null, etc...)
